Name: Gonzo
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Lustau Amontillado Los Arcos Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Highball (max 10oz/300ml) glass .
Prepare garnish of pink (or red) grapefruit wedge.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring tonic water.
Review: Tall and refreshing with a delicate balance between tonic's quinine bitterness and maraschino's sweetness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created for Bacardí Legacy 2017 by Kaitlin Wilkes at Corner Club in Stockholm, Sweden.
Nutrition: One serving of Gonzo contains 190 calories
